job_tasks.phrase: collecting business requirements from product stakeholders
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly indicates the need to gather and understand business needs from product stakeholders, aligning with the definition of Business Understanding.

job_tasks.phrase: Evaluate possible architecture solutions considering business and technology requirements
job_tasks.justification: This task explicitly involves considering both business and technology requirements when evaluating solutions, which is a core aspect of Business Understanding.

job_tasks.phrase: Be responsible for business-related data governance processes, technical implementation, and maintenance of data processing services and storage systems
job_tasks.justification: This phrase covers the technical implementation and maintenance of data processing services and storage systems, which falls under the umbrella of Data Engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: leveraging GenAI to build fine-tuned models for more relevant recommendations
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly mentions building 'fine-tuned models' using 'GenAI', which is a core activity within the Modeling category, particularly for generative AI.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop production-grade Machine Learning systems, from models to features and pipelines
job_tasks.justification: This phrase highlights the development of ML systems, specifically mentioning 'models', which is central to the Modeling task.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop production-grade Machine Learning systems, from models to features and pipelines
job_tasks.justification: While 'models' are mentioned, the phrase also encompasses building 'features and pipelines' for 'production-grade systems', leaning towards the software development aspect of putting ML into practice.

job_tasks.phrase: Build readable and reusable code, applying code quality best practices and using standard libraries.
job_tasks.justification: This describes core software development practices like writing quality code and using libraries, which are essential for building applications.

job_tasks.phrase: Take full ownership of services end-to-end by actively monitoring system health, performance, and business impact.
job_tasks.justification: Owning services end-to-end, including monitoring health and performance, is a key aspect of software development lifecycle management.

job_tasks.phrase: Combine innovation with reuse by abstracting ML/AI concepts from one application to a generalized framework
job_tasks.justification: This involves building generalized frameworks and abstracting concepts, which is a software development practice to promote reusability.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop production-grade Machine Learning systems, from models to features and pipelines, accounting for reliability, scalability, real-time requirements, monitoring, and retraining.
job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'reliability, scalability, real-time requirements, monitoring, and retraining' are all key components of MLOps, focusing on productionizing and maintaining ML systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Take full ownership of services end-to-end by actively monitoring system health, performance, and business impact. Ensure the relevant service level objectives (SLOs) are met.
job_tasks.justification: Ensuring SLOs are met and monitoring system health and performance are direct responsibilities within MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: Be responsible for business-related data governance processes, technical implementation, and maintenance of data processing services and storage systems, as well as ML governance processes.
job_tasks.justification: ML governance processes are a key part of MLOps, ensuring responsible and compliant deployment of ML models.

soft_skills.phrase: You will work closely together with the other Machine Learning Scientists and Machine Learning Engineers in the Intent Discovery track as well as with Data Engineers, Software Engineers and Product Managers.
Continuously evolve your craft by keeping up to date with the latest developments in ML/AI and related technologies and upskilling as needed.
Choose the right technology or coding methodology and refactor and simplify code when necessary.
Take full ownership of services end-to-end
Combine innovation with reuse by abstracting ML/AI concepts from one application to a generalized framework

classification.rationale: The job heavily emphasizes developing 'production-grade Machine Learning systems' from models to pipelines, including aspects of reliability, scalability, and monitoring, aligning strongly with MLOps. While GenAI is mentioned, the core focus appears to be on the engineering and operationalization of ML systems rather than primarily generative model development itself.
